title: Pork and cabbage in miso sauce
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g pork fillet, sliced', 'Sauce', '4 tablespoons white miso paste', '125ml water', '2 tablespoons mirin', '1 tablespoon Japanese soy sauce (tamari)', '2 tablespoons sake (rice wine)', '1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '1/4 of cabbage, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '12 yam bundles']
